1010.「だまされてたまるか！\n 邪悪なニオイを ぷんぷんさせた者めっ！:
I won't be deceived!
You reek of evil!

1012.「だまれ！ 誰に向かって クチをきいている！！: Silence! Who do you think you're talking to?

1024.「こいつも さっきの ジジイと同じだ！\n 牢に放り込んで 一生出すな！！:
They're just like the old man!
Lock them in a cell and throw away the key!!

1025.「くそっ 頭が 割れそうに痛む……！\n ガートラントめ……。:
Urghh, it feels like my head is splitting
apart! That rotten Gartlant...

1029.「じつは…… 先日も 王の命令で\n あなたのような 罪なき人を\n 牢に入れた:
Actually... The other day, I had an innocent
person like you locked up on the king's orders
and they were released almost instantly!

1030.「ですから あなたも すぐに\n 出してもらえるのではないかと！\n こう思う次:
So I'm sure you'll be able to get out soon
too! At least, that's what I think!

1033.「わしは 世界を旅して 知った。:
I've traveled the world.
I know the whole story.

1034.「お前たち エテーネの民は\n 冥王ネルゲルのやつに 相当\n ひどい目に あわ:
It seems you people of Ethene suffered quite a
bitter fate at the Netherlord's hands.

1038.「やはり エイドスさまには\n おわかりなのですね！\n 王が 以前のバグド王で:
So you know it too!
That man isn't the King Bagudo we know!

1039.「じつは……\n 王は 先日まで 病に倒れていたのです。:
The truth is... The king was ill until the
other day...

1040.「なんとか 一命は取りとめましたが\n 以来 ひどい頭痛に悩まされ いつもイライ:
He survived, but ever since then he's been
suffering from terrible headaches, he's always
on edge, and he seems to hate everything...

1041.「ガートラントに戦争を仕掛けるなど\n たとえ どんな理由があったとしても\n:
He never said anything about waging war on
Gartlant before, no matter what the reason...

1042.「いったい 王は どうしてしまったのでしょう？\n あの頭痛さえ 治れば\n 元:
What's wrong with the king?
Will he return to the kind and gentle king he
used to be once that headache is gone?

1045.「王の頭痛を取りのぞく方法が\n ないわけでもないが……。:
Well, it's not that there isn't a way to get
rid of the king's headache, but...

1047.「ジダン兵士長よ。\n 教えるのなら そなたではなく\n この者のほうが よさそ:
Captain Jidan.
If you wish for me to teach someone, this
person may be a better fit for the job.

1049.「お前の名は……\n そうか <pc>というのか。:
Your name is...
<pc>, is it not?

1050.「<pc>よ。\n 王を 元に戻すには それなりの覚悟と\n 勇気が必要になるじ:
<pc>.
It will take great courage and determination
to restore the king to his former self.

1051.「この国を救う覚悟ができたなら\n わしを訪ねて 宿屋に来るがいい。\n ……待:
If you are ready to save this country, come
see me at the inn. ...I'll be waiting.

1054.「あなただけが 頼りなんです。\n さあ もう一度 返事を聞かせてください。:
You're the only one I can rely on.
Now, please let me hear your reply again.

1055.「ありがとうございます！\n さすが エイドスさまに見込まれた方！:
Thank you!
Sage Eidos was wise to choose you!

1056.「さあ 城の出口まで お送りしましょう。\n 宿屋に滞在中の エイドスさまを\n:
Now, I will escort you to the castle exit.
Please go see Sage Eidos, who's staying at the
inn.

1060.「時間がない。率直に言おう。\n バグド王の様子が おかしいのは\n 悪しき瘴気:
Time is of the essence. I will be frank.
The reason King Bagudo is acting strangely is
because he is affected by the demon miasma.

1061.「わしや お前に あれほど\n はげしい嫌悪を示したのは わしらの中の\n 聖な:
He took such an intense dislike to you and I
because he sensed a divine power in us.

1062.「魔瘴のことは 知っておるな？\n あの まがまがしき悪魔の霧のことじゃ。:
You know of the demon miasma, don't you?
That abominable dark mist.

1063.「魔物がまとえば そのチカラは何倍にも強まり\n 人が触れれば 命を落とすか\n:
It's said that a monster that wreathes itself in it grows much stronger, but a person who touches it either dies or has their mind
stained with evil.

1064.「なかば 忘れられた存在だった魔瘴が\n 今 ふたたび 活発化したのは 冥王ネル:
The once-forgotten demon miasma is now active
again because Netherlord Nergel has descended
upon the world.

1065.「<pc>よ。\n この国を救う覚悟は できたな？:
<pc>.
Are you prepared to save this country?

1066.「バグド王に取りついた魔瘴を はらうために\n 必要なものは……。:
To rid King Bagudo of the miasma that haunts
him, all you need is...

1069.「必要なものは レムルの聖杯じゃ。\n グレン領西の北部 ベコン渓谷の奥に\n:
What you need is Lemur's Chalice.
It still lies in the depths of Becon Valley in
the northwestern part of Glen Territory.

1070.「たやすく 入手できるものではないから\n しっかりと準備をして おもむくがいい:
It's not an easy thing to come by, so you must
be prepared. I'll meet you back here once you
have it.

1076.「オォォォォ…… 誰だ？\n われから 聖杯を うばわんとする者は！？:
Ooooooooooooohhhhh... Who's there?
Who dares steal the Chalice from me?

1077.「……そうか 貴様\n ガートラントの追っ手だな？:
...I see.
You're with Gartlant, aren't you?

1078.「わが名は 剣士オーレン……。\n レムルの聖杯は われに残された\n ただひと:
My name is Oren the Swordsman.
Lemur's Chalice is my last hope!

1083.「<pc>さんって あなたでしょ？\n エイドスさまから 伝言を預かっているから:
<pc>, is that you?
I have a message for you from Sage Eidos.
I'll read it now.

1084.「急で すまぬが 旅立つことになった。\n <pc>なら 問題なく\n レムルの:
"Forgive me for leaving on such short notice.
I'm sure you'll have no problem retrieving
Lemur's Chalice."

1085.「次は その聖杯を持って はるか南東へ行け。\n グレン領東の南から ゲルト海峡:
"Now, take the Chalice and go far to the southeast. From the south of East Glen Territory, go southeast through the Gelt
Strait to Sky Lake in the southeast part of the Landon Mountains."

1086.「そこには グロリスの木という\n 目には見えぬ 不思議な樹木が そびえておる。:
"There stands a mysterious invisible tree
called the Gloris Tree. Bring back a droplet
from that tree."

1087.「レムルの聖杯で 受けとめた\n グロリスのしずくだけが 魔瘴をはらえる。\n:
"Only the Droplet of Gloris, when drunk from
Lemur's Chalice, can repel the demon miasma.
Make the king drink it, and he'll be cured."

1088.「ただ 雲上湖には 恐ろしい竜がおる。\n 襲われぬように 気をつけてな。\n:
"Unfortunately, a terrible dragon resides in
the Sky Lake. Be careful not to be attacked."
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　    Eidos

1089.「王を治すだなんて さすが エイドスさま！\n やっぱり ステキ……。:
As expected, Eidos is going to cure the king!
He really is amazing...

1096.<cs_pchero>は\nグロリスのしずく（だいじなもの）を\n手に入れた！<:
<cs_pchero> received
the Droplet of Gloris (Key Item)!<me_60>

1102.「お待ちしておりました <pc>さん！\n グロリスのしずくを 手に入れたのです:
I've been expecting you, <pc>!
You've got the Droplet of Gloris, right?

1103.「エイドスさまから 話は 聞いています。\n それを 王に飲ませれば 王は治ると:
Lord Eidos explained everything to me.
He said if we give it to the king, he'll be
cured!

1104.「さあ そのグロリスのしずくを 私に。: Now, hand me the Droplet of Gloris.

1107.「<pc>さん ありがとうございました！\n 王に これを飲ませるのは 私たちの:
You have my thanks, <pc>!
It's our responsibility to make the king drink
this. Please stay back and watch.

1110.「貴様ら……\n いったい なんのマネだ……！？:
You...
What do you think you're doing?!

1111.「その 汚らわしい水を\n これ以上 われに 近づけたら……: If you bring that filthy water any closer...

1115.「ザンボア！\n 早く グロリスのしずくを 王に……！:
Zanboa!
Quick, give the Droplet of Gloris to the king.

1121.「おお…… 王よ……。\n 元に 戻られたのですね！:
Ohh...! My king...
You've returned to normal!

1124.「こんな すがすがしい気分になれる日が\n また 来ようとは……。: I never thought I'd feel so refreshed again...

1125.「ない！ ネックレスが……\n 誰か われのネックレスを 知らぬか？:
It's not here! My necklace... Does anyone
know where my necklace is?

1126.「おそれながら ご報告させていただきます。\n 王は あのネックレスの呪いで\n:
I'm sorry to be the bearer of bad news.
That necklace's curse is the very thing that
brought you to the brink of death, my king.

1129.「友好の証と見せかけて 呪いの品を送るなど\n そのような姑息なまねを\n ガー:
There's no way Gartlant would be so cutthroat
as to send a cursed item under the guise of
friendship!

1132.「神父や僧侶にも なすすべなく\n ただ 弱っていく王を 見守ることしか\n で:
One day, when the priests could do nothing but
watch as your state deteriorated...

1136.「これは 魔瘴石のネックレスだ。\n あやうく 王は死ぬところだったと\n マリ:
It was a necklace of miasmite.
Malynn said that you almost died.

1137.「そして 王に いやしの術をかけ\n 王の容態が 安定したのを確認すると……:
Then, after casting a healing spell on you and
making sure your condition was stable...

1138.「マリーンは このネックレスは危険だと言って\n この国から 魔瘴石のネックレス:
Malynn said that the necklace was dangerous
and took it out of the country.

1146.「……ほうびと言えば キーエンブレムだが。: ...Speaking of gifts, this is the Key Emblem.

1150.「なに！？\n われが ガートラント城に 宣戦布告したと！？:
What?!
You think I declared war on Gartlant Castle?!

1151.「それが本当なら……\n この者の はたらきがなければ 我が国は……。:
If that's true...
Then if it weren't for this person's hard
work, our country would be...

1152.「そういうことならば あいわかった！: If that's the case, I understand!

1153.「<pc>よ！ 心から感謝する！\n そなたの活躍 グレン城のキーエンブレムを\:
<pc>! I thank you from the bottom
of my heart! Your work is worthy of this
castle's Key Emblem!

1156.「その 黒のキーエンブレムは\n グレンの英雄であることを示すもの。\n 他国で:
That Black Key Emblem identifies you as a
hero of Glen... It'll serve as a testament to
your power in other lands.

1157.「チグリ大臣よ。\n すぐに おふれを出せ！: Minister Chigri. Send a message immediately!

1158.「ガートラントと いくさは やらん！\n 皆 日々の暮らしに戻れ！ ……とな。:
"I won't go to war with Gartlant!
Everyone, return to your daily lives!"

1160.「いくさが起きていれば\n 多くの血が このオーグリード大陸に\n 流れるところ:
If war had broken out, more blood would have
been spilled on the continent of Ogreed...

1161.「……本当に よかった。\n このグレンの民に つらい思いを\n させずにすんで:
...I'm truly grateful.
I'm relieved that the people of Glen don't
have to go through that...

8017.「バグド王 どうなさいました？\n エイドスさまが 来てくださったのですぞ。:
King Bagudo, what's going on?
Sage Eidos is here to see you.

8019.「バ…バグド王……！\n まさか 賢者エイドスさまのことが\n わからないのです:
K... King Bagudo...! Don't tell me you
don't recognize Sage Eidos?

8021.「そのジジイを 牢に放り込め！\n 二度と われに 顔を見せるなっ！！:
Throw the old man in jail! Don't you ever
show your face to me again!

8022.「バグド王め。\n 難儀なことに なっておるのう。:
King Bagudo.
This is a grave situation.

8023.「……この国では\n こんな問題が 起こっておるのか。:
So this is the sort of problem this country is
facing?

8024.「バグド王に 申し上げます！\n こちらの旅人が グレン城の兵士になりたいと\n:
Allow me to speak, King Bagudo!
This traveler has volunteered to work as a
soldier for Castle Glen.

8025.「やっと 一人前の証を持つ者が 現れたか。\n なるほど。それなりに ウデが立ち:
So someone with a Mark of Adulthood has
finally shown up? I see.
They certainly seem to have some skill.

8026.「われの目を ごまかせると思うか？\n 我が国に 災いをもたらさんとする者め！！:
Do you think you can deceive me? You who seek
to bring misfortune to my country!

8027.「さ さすがは バグド王！\n ひと目で この者の本質を 見抜かれるとは！:
Th-that's King Bagudo for you!
To think that you could see their true nature
at a glance!

8028.「ええい！ そいつを早く牢に！\n われから遠ざけよ！:
Whatever! Just throw them in prison!
Get them out of here!

8030.「こんな所で会うとは 奇遇じゃの。: What a coincidence to meet you here...

8031.「ふむ…… 先ほど 感じたとおり\n お前は 生き返しを受けた者じゃな。:
Hmm... As I sensed earlier, you've been
brought back to life, haven't you?

8032.「たいへん 申し訳ございませんでした。\n どうか お許しください エイドスさま:
This situation is completely inexcusable.
Please forgive me, Sage Eidos.

8033.「顔を上げられよ ジダン兵士長。\n 今の王なら わしに あのような態度を取るの:
Raise your head, Captain Jidan.
It's no wonder that the current king behaves
towards me as he does.

8035.「バグド王のことは\n ヤツが 赤ん坊の頃から知っておる。\n このまま 見捨て:
I've known King Bagudo since he was a baby.
I'm not just going to abandon him.

8036.「じゃが 知ってのとおり わしは忙しい。\n この国にも いつまで滞在できるか\:
But, as you know, I'm very busy.
I don't know how long I'll be able to stay in
this country.

8037.「では エイドスさま！\n 私に その方法を教えてください。\n 王のためなら:
Then, Sage Eidos, please show me what to do!
I'll do anything to help the king!

8039.「王が今のままでは このオーグリード大陸にて\n ひどい戦争が起こります。\n:
If the king continues as he is, there will be
a terrible war on the Ogreed continent. If
that happens, many of our people will suffer!

8040.「<pc>さん どうかお願いします。\n バグド王を 元に戻すため\n チカラを:
<pc>, please.
I need your help to restore King Bagudo to his
former glory!<yesno><close>

8041.「けっして 誰にも渡さぬっ！！: I'll never let anyone take it!!

8042.<pc>は ジダン兵士長に\nグロリスのしずくが入った\nレムルの聖杯を 渡した:
<pc> gave Captain Jidan Lemur's
Chalice, which contains the Droplet of Gloris!

8043.「これで バグド王を 元に戻せる……。: Now we can heal King Bagudo...

8046.「ぐおお！ 貴様ら 許さんぞ！！: Graaaaaah! I'll never forgive you for this!!

8052.「あの ひどい頭痛が 消えておる。\n 永遠に続くかと思われた あの頭痛が……。:
That terrible headache is gone.
It seemed like it would last forever...

8054.「ええ。私も そう思います。\n おそらくは ガートラント以外の何者かが\n 王:
Yes. I thought so too.
Perhaps someone unaffiliated with Gartlant
wanted the king dead.

8055.「……あの 忌まわしいネックレスは\n 王の首から 決して離れず\n あやしい光:
...That abominable necklace never left your
neck and continually casted a sinister light
upon you.

8056.「突然 とてつもなく大きな\n 人間の女が 現れました。\n それが あの賢者マ:
Suddenly, a human woman of extraordinary size
appeared. That woman was Sage Malynn.

8057.「ウワサは聞いた。\n 王を助けたいなら だまって見ていろと\n マリーンは言い:
According to rumor, Sage Malynn then said "if
you want to help the king, just shut up and
watch".

8058.「彼女が呪文を唱えると 私たちが 何をしても\n はずせなかった ネックレスが\:
She cast a spell, and the necklace that we
couldn't remove, no matter what we did, just
fell off.

8059.「そうだったのか。\n あの名高い賢者マリーンが われを……:
So that's what happened, is it?
Then Sage Malynn...

8061.「王を 頭痛から解き放つため\n グロリスのしずくを 手に入れてくれたのが\n:
This person here is <pc>, who got the
Droplet of Gloris to free you from your
headache...

8062.「そして この<pc>さんに\n 王を治すための知恵を 授けたのは\n あのエイ:
Furthermore, Sage Eidos was the one who gave
<pc> the knowledge required to
heal you.

8063.「なんと！\n エイドスさまが いらしていたのか？:
What did you say?!
Sage Eidos is here?

8064.「むう…… まったく記憶にないぞ。\n いくら ひどい頭痛の中にあったとはいえ…:
Mmm... I don't remember anything.
Even in the middle of that terrible
headache...

8065.「ともかく われは 正気を失っている間に\n 多くの人々に 迷惑をかけたようだ。:
Anyway, while I was out of my mind, I caused
a lot of trouble for a lot of people.
I must thank you, <pc>.

8067.「しかし キーエンブレムとは 英雄の証。\n 頭痛を治した程度で 与えてよいもの:
But the Key Emblem is a sign of heroism.
Can I give it to you just because you cured my
headache?

8068.「やはり この国を救うような\n 大きなことを やりとげた者でなくては……。:
After all, the person who receives it has to
do something big to save the country...

8071.「そして 何より……\n オーガ同士に 取り返しのつかない\n 憎しみ合いを さ:
And most importantly of all...
you saved the ogres from travelling down the
path of hatred...

31956.「オォォォォ…… 誰だ？\n われから 聖杯を うばわんとする者は！？:
Ooooooooooooohhhhh... Who's there?
Who dares steal the Chalice from me?

31957.「……そうか 貴様\n ガートラントの追っ手だな？:
...I see.
You're with Gartlant, aren't you?

31958.「わが名は 剣士オーレン……。\n レムルの聖杯は われに残された\n ただひと:
My name is Oren the Swordsman.
Lemur's Chalice is my last hope!

31959.「けっして 誰にも渡さぬっ！！: I'll never let anyone take it!!

41121.「ほら お客さん。\n 正面に 奇妙な形をした島が見えるだろう？\n あの島は:
Look, <if_woman>ma'am<else>sir<endif>.
See that oddly-shaped island out front there?
That's Gamilgo's Shield Island.

41122.「はるか昔 ガートラントと グレンの王が\n 同盟を誓いあった場所なんだそうだ。:
That's the place where the kings of Gartlant and Glen are said to have sworn an oath of alliance long ago.
We know very little about it, though.

41123.「さあ それより始めるよ。\n カウントーーダウンッ！！:
Now, let's get things rolling.
COUNTDOWN!!

41128.「はいよっ お疲れさま！\n 眠ってた勇気は 目を覚ましたかい？:
Alright, good work!
Has your sleeping courage been awakened?

41129.「また 気が向いたら いつでも\n 海峡バンジーに 挑戦しにきてくれよ！:
Whenever you're feeling up to it, you can
always come back and try your hand at bungee
jumping!

44125.「ふむ…… 先ほど 感じたとおり\n お前は ただの旅人ではないようじゃな。:
Hmm... As I sensed earlier, you're not just a
traveler...

44126.「お前たちは 彼の世界の王に\n 相当 ひどい目に あわされたようじゃな。:
It seems you've been beset by a grievous fate
at the hands of his world's equivalent to a
ruler.

45453.「なかば 忘れられた存在だった魔瘴が\n 今 ふたたび 活発化したのは 彼の世界:
The long-forgotten miasma has now been
revitalized by the arrival of the ruler of his
domain here in Astoltia.

129929.「この国は 同じオーガの国である\n ガートラントとの いくさを控え\n 一人前:
This country is preparing for war with
Gartlant, another ogre nation, so we're
gathering heroes with the Mark of Adulthood!

129930.「もし お前が 一人前の証を持っているなら\n この国の兵士となって ともに戦っ:
If you have a Mark of Adulthood, then I want
you to become a soldier of this country and
fight with us!

129931.「兵士に志願するなら グレン城におられる\n バグド王に 会いにいってくれ！\n:
If you wish to volunteer to become a soldier, you'll have to go see King Bagudo at Castle Glen.
The castle entrance is at the top of these stairs.

221092.「ほら お客さん。\n 正面に見える ガミルゴの盾島を知ってるかい？\n 以前は:
Look, ma'amsir. Are you familiar with Gamilgo's Shield Island?
There used to be an enormous statue of a giant with a shield.

221094.「だが ある事件で 消えちまってな。\n その代わりに現れた 大きな穴は\n な:
But it vanished after a certain incident. The
big hole that appeared in its place is rumored
to be an entrance to Makai, the demon world.
